sentences.en: And purchases special callipers to survey pinhole.
sentences.cn: 并且购买特殊的卡尺来测量销孔.

sentences.en: Centrifugal casting, compact structure, free from pinhole porosity and slag, smooth surface and even wall thickness.
sentences.cn: 高速离心铸造, 组织致密, 无砂眼、夹渣, 表面光滑、壁厚均匀.

sentences.en: Desd - foldcharacteristics, non - polluting, pinhole for pelling off, uniformly thickness and width , adequate adequate adhesiveness along its full length, and high durability.
sentences.cn: 易折叠, 无污染, 易剥离, 宽度及厚度协调粘贴度强,经久耐用.

sentences.en: For their next work, they'll be looking at how to replicate the intricate grooves and pinhole depressions.
sentences.cn: 至于下一步的工作，他们要研究怎么模拟复杂的沟槽和针孔凹陷。

sentences.en: He then shines a narrow beam in horizontally through the pinhole.
sentences.cn: 然后他通过小孔水平地射入一窄光束.

sentences.en: Making the clear picture for deburring i . e . pinhole.
sentences.cn: 制作每工序的清晰的去毛刺图示化的作业指导书.

sentences.en: Pinhole machining of pin gear housing is one of important procedures in manufacturing cycloid speed reducer.
sentences.cn: 针齿壳销孔的加工是摆线针轮减速器制造的重要步骤之一.

sentences.en: Precise boring of the pinhole is one of the key processes guaranteeing precision in piston machining.
sentences.cn: 精镗销孔是活塞加工中保证精度的关键工序之一.

sentences.en: The yellow parts has small oval-shaped protrusions, each with one or two “pinhole” depressions.
sentences.cn: 黄色部分有小的椭圆形突出，每个突出又有一到二个“针孔”状凹陷。

sentences.en: They also abandoned using any corrective lenses, firing the X-ray pulse through a pinhole and then collecting the diffracted rays after they pass through the sample.
sentences.cn: 他们也放弃使用任何矫正透镜，而是通过一个针孔发射X光射线，然后采集经过样品后的衍射光线。

sentences.en: This experiment demonstrates the theory of pinhole imaging.
sentences.cn: 这个实验是为了演示小孔成像的原理.

sentences.en: This is the earliest pinhole image formation experiment and the earliest cognition of rectilinear propagation.
sentences.cn: 八条中的后三条叙述了反射(平面、凹面、凸面)镜成像现象.

trans.tran_en: a very small hole in something, especially one made by a pin
